article_title: Swimming alert lifted for popular Craven Co. swimming area
article_text:
A water quality swimming alert put in effect Friday has been lifted one day later for a sound-side site in Craven County.

State recreational water quality officials say the alert affected the swimming area on the Neuse River located at 818 Neuse Drive near New Bern.

Officials say the water is now safe for swimming and water play.



PREVIOUS STORY:

A swimming alert has been issued for a sound-side site in Craven County. The same place has seen advisories before.

State recreational water quality officials say bacteria levels prompted the alert Friday at the Greene Springs swimming area off Neuse Drive near New Bern.

People are told not to swim at that site. WITN will let you know when officials say the water is safe.
